Name: Charfruit Roast Lv.1
Description2$english: Meat ribs are embedded with fruit, smoked over charcoal fire until the fat is rendered, the meat becomes firm, and the fruit aroma bursts out, resulting in a sumptuous dish.

recipes.Name: Charfruit Roast
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Juicy fruit nestled within the meat, charcoal-smoked to perfection—as the fat renders down and the flesh tightens, bursting with fruity aroma—yielding a robust, fragrant masterpiece.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Juicy fruit nestled within the meat, charcoal-smoked to perfection—as the fat renders down and the flesh tightens, bursting with fruity aroma—yielding a robust, fragrant masterpiece.

NeedMaterial.Name: Premium Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Finely processed fresh meat, retaining only the essence of flavor through precise knife work, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a gourmet delicacy.

recipes.Name: Premium Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into Premium Raw Meat that can be used as a high-grade ingredient.
This process yields 7-8 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process beast meat into Premium Raw Meat that can be used as a high-grade ingredient.
This process yields 7-8 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Large Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Umu Fruit
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Grown upon floating islands, only the tempest-swept lands can cultivate its distinctive flavor.

NeedMaterial.Name: Salt
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A basic seasoning that provides essential nutrients for the human body.

NeedMaterial.Name: Rock Salt
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Crystallized rock salt is valued for its versatility beyond table use.
